attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To launch an appeal for funds to assist Ausralian residents who have lost their homes in the recent bush fires. Australians have generously, and often heroically come to the aid of the United Kingdom and the Commonwealth we should now support them.

rejection.details: There are already several initiatives to raise money for victims of the Australian bush fires. We recommend you contact them to see how you might be able to help.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
